items.todoItem: Don’t boast about what you will do tomorrow.
Let another man praise you and not your own lips.
Welcome the faithful wounds of a friend.
Know your place and do not step out of it.
Take pleasure from hearty counsel with friends.
Don’t forsake close friends or friends of the family.
Help friends and be helped by them.
Know that the heart of a man is reflected by the man.
Know that the eyes of man are never satisfied.
Manage your investments and take care of your assets.
